org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc

Class BasicShapeDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc.BasicShapeDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>, ConnectedComponentProcessor

    public class BasicShapeDescriptor
extends Object
implements ConnectedComponentProcessor, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    Basic descriptors of the shape of a connected component.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BasicShapeDescriptor.BasicShapeDescriptorType
      An enum of all the different basic shape descriptors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double area
      The area of the component
      double chfit
      The ratio of the area of the component to the area of its convex hull
      double compactness
      The compactness of the component.
      double cornerEst
      The estimated number of corners of the component
      double cx
      The x coordinate of the component centroid
      double cy
      The y coordinate of the component centroid
      double direction
      The primary orientation of the component
      double elongatedness
      The elongatedness of the component.

    • Field Detail

      • area

        public double area
        The area of the component
        See Also:
        PixelSet.calculateArea()

      • cx

        public double cx
        The x coordinate of the component centroid
        See Also:
        PixelSet.calculateCentroid()

      • cy

        public double cy
        The y coordinate of the component centroid
        See Also:
        PixelSet.calculateCentroid()

      • direction

        public double direction
        The primary orientation of the component
        See Also:
        PixelSet.calculateDirection()

      • elongatedness

        public double elongatedness
        The elongatedness of the component. Elongatedness is defined as the ratio of the height to width of the oriented bounding box of the component.
        See Also:
        ConnectedComponent.calculateOrientatedBoundingBoxAspectRatio()

      • compactness

        public double compactness
        The compactness of the component. Compactness is defined as the ratio of the squared edge length of the component to its area.

      • chfit

        public double chfit
        The ratio of the area of the component to the area of its convex hull
        See Also:
        ConnectedComponent.calculatePercentageConvexHullFit()

      • cornerEst

        public double cornerEst
        The estimated number of corners of the component
        See Also:
        ConnectedComponent.estimateNumberOfVertices(int, int)
